Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.29859288] Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923 (MIC=66.6 ± 28.8 μg/mL);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli ATCC 25922 (MIC=41.6 ± 14.4 μM), Extended-spectrum beta-lactamase producing Escherichia coli (MIC=41.6 ± 14.4 μg/mL), New Delhi metallo-bata-lactamase-1 producing Acinetobacter baumannii  (MIC=20.8 ± 7.2 μg/mL);Fungi:Candida albicans ATCC 90028 (MIC=166.6 ± 57.7 μg/mL)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.29859288] Hemolysis 10.4 ± 2.2% at 500 μg/ml against human red blood cells
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Structure Description: The peptide adopts a conformational structure with 81 % alpha helix.
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against the Gram-positive and Gram-negative bacteria. Antifungal activity.

Literature.Title: Expression in Escherichia coli of novel recombinant hybrid antimicrobial peptide AL32-P113 with enhanced antimicrobial activity in vitro.
Literature.Author: Wanmakok M, Orrapin S, Intorasoot A, Intorasoot S.
